arStrings.szText: The {c_highlight}Seneschal{/c} Construct is a staunch ally. It cannot be killed but can be staggered.
You can choose your Construct's abilities by assigning {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c}. These abilities can be modified with {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c}.
Your Construct can be customized in your inventory, under the Construct tab {icon:Inventory_Tab_Icon_Buddy,1.8}.
Acquiring duplicate {c_highlight}Governing{/c} and {c_highlight}Tuning{/c} Stones will upgrade the duplicate stone.
The {c_highlight}Seneschal{/c} Construct is a staunch ally. It cannot be killed but can be staggered.
You can choose your Construct's abilities by assigning {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c}. These abilities can be modified with {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c}.
Your Construct can be customized in your inventory, under the Construct tab {icon:Inventory_Tab_Icon_Buddy,1.8}.
Acquiring duplicate {c_highlight}Governing{/c} and {c_highlight}Tuning{/c} Stones will upgrade the duplicate stone.
